phrases: A neutral country of 17 million people.
It is a world of magic.
Magic is bought and sold there every day.
It is an integral part of people's lives.
And there are those who use magic as their occupation.
Those people are referred to as wizards.
The wizards belong to various guilds and perform jobs on commission.
There are a large number of guilds within the country.
And in a certain city there lies a certain guild.
A guild from which various legends were once born...
Or rather, will continue to be born long into the future...
I will gather all the light, and shine down on your tomorrow!
Until your heart can hear it...
Are you sure you are not forgetting something?
When you are not here to make me laugh,
even what I am looking for cannot be found.
Snowing, be honest with yourself and smile,
because when two people lay close, time overlaps.
I will gather all the light, and shine down on your tomorrow!
Natsu, Gray... lend me your power.
I will tag along, but I have one condition.
When we get back, let us have a match!
Eisenwald may have been destroyed, but the root of the problem still remains unresolved.
The number of dark guilds rivals that of the stars themselves.
Then we should come up with a plan to wipe them all out at once.
I will not stand for Zeref's magic falling into their hands again!
And how was it that they obtained such magic so easily in the first place?
Blame goes all the way up to the administrative level.
It seems like this time we were saved by that thorn in our sides, Fairy Tail.
They destroyed a whole dark guild with just 4 or 5 people.
I know it is not something you want to accept, but that is reality.
We would be in dire straits if the Lullaby had actually killed those guild masters.
It would have cost the heads of many of us standing here.
You intend to lay blame even on the Council itself?
Their tendency for wanton destruction gives me headaches!
We must repay them for their kindness.
The incident with Eisenwald targeting the guild masters during their regular meeting
became big news immediately and everyone in the country learned of it.
I would have never believed I would be at the center of such a huge event.
Even so, I am living my day to day life just like I always do.
Sometimes I think back on what happened and get all excited, though.
I got wind that most of Eisenwald's members were arrested, including that guy named Kage.
Well, I guess that is expected.
The one thing that scares me is they do not seem to have caught Erigor.
What will I do if he comes to take revenge on Fairy Tail?
Natsu, Erza, and Gray are Fairy Tail's strongest team!
Plus: Happy and I are there, too!
This guild's the best, so do not worry, Mom.
Keep this a secret from Dad,'kay?
Maybe I will do some shopping today.
Thrilling adventures are great and all, but you cannot beat relaxing at home!
Rent for this place is 70,000 jewel?
You found yourself a nice pad, Lucy!
And do not strip in other people's homes!
I was already naked when I arrived.
I figured you would forget, so I came to get you.
Natsu said so before we left, right?
If they did not take this seriously, they could not call themselves men!
But if two of the people in the strongest team clash...
You are the top three in Fairy Tail, right?
I do recognize Natsu's and Gray's manly spirit.
But I would not go calling them the strongest.
There is a ton more strong people in Fairy Tail.
Erza is probably the strongest woman, though.
If you are talking about the strongest man, it is probably Mystogan or Laxus.
I just thought that Natsu, Gray, and Erza worked the best together!
Were not you saying how you were always worried Gray and Natsu would fight without Erza around?
Regardless, I think this will be an interesting battle.
I expect Erza to win easily.
How many years has it been since we have pitted our magic head to head like this?
I was just a kid then!
Things will be different this time!
I am going to beat you!
I do not plan on holding back.
It is been a while since I truly tested my own limits!
Erza, that is going too far!
Yeah, I will betting on Erza after all.
I do not like this sort of thing!
I do not want either one to lose!
You are unexpectedly innocent, are not you?
In that case, guess I have go full power, no holding back!
I told you it would be a good battle.
I am a messenger from the Council.
Why did they send one here?
They are ignoring the scene in front of them, are not they?
Stemming from the recent Eisenwald incident, we hereby charge you with 11 counts of criminal property damage.
Erza Scarlet, you are under arrest.
You will just go on a rampage if we let you out.
If I do that, you will go to rescue her, right?
It is the Council we are dealing with here.
This one's out of our hands.
I have something I want to say!
Council or no Council, those guys were the bad ones!
If you are innocent and the Council says you are guilty, then you are guilty.
You seriously think they would listen to us?
But we have done all that stuff before...
Yeah, it is hard to understand.
Got to be something behind it!
This is the Council's Fiore Branch.
This is where judgment will be passed on Erza, but just then...
Do not be so on guard.
My body is now in ERA.
The old men in the next room are also all thought projections.
It is not like they would actually come all the way here for such a trivial matter.
This is all your doing, is not it?
After all, I am on Fairy Tail's side.
The old men were afraid that they would share in the blame,
so they created a plan to push responsibility onto others.
I wanted to see you before the trial and warn you.
Say nothing of the past to the old men.
I will be waiting on the other side of the door.
As a member of the Council.
You know some powerful people, do not you?
Do not get in my way, Erza.
Not after I have come this far...
We will now commence this Wizard's Trial.
Let us go testify on her behalf!
Once they decide on a verdict, it will be too late!
It does not matter how fast we go, if we leave now we will not make it in time!
You suddenly run out of steam?
In order to pose as Natsu, I transformed myself into a gecko.
I will pretend to be you!
So then, where is the real Natsu?
He did not go after Erza, did he?
You have got to be kidding me!
That guy might actually try and punch a council member!
We will wait patiently for the results.
In regards to the recent incident involving Eisenwald and the Lullaby.
You will answer to charges concerning the damage to parts of Oshibana Station,
the destruction of the Ryusika Gorge railway,
and the complete collapse of the Clover Meeting Hall.
You are accused of these acts of destruction.
According to witnesses at the scene,
the culprit was an armored female wizard!
I am the armored female wizard!
You want to catch me, then just try!
If I did something wrong, then spit it out!
And the crime had better be worse than murdering the guild masters!
Erza, do not apologize to these guys!
I do not even know what to say to you.
They arrested me just for show.
It is to preserve the order of the magical world.
The council must make a show of enforcing law among wizards.
I do not get it at all!
It means that they will find me guilty, but there will not be any real punishment!
I would probably have been back today.
If you had not gone nuts, that is!
So he was in Fairy Tail?
Ah, the sweet smell of freedom!
Who knew freedom was so great?
This is what makes him so lovable.
So it was all an arrest for show...
She is a scapegoat but not a sacrificial lamb!
You are an ice wizard, all right...
That joke gave me the chills...
So, what about your man-to-man battle with Erza, Natsu?
Erza, let us continue where we left off!
What am I to do with you?
Erza's strong, that is for sure!
Are not you going to undo the sleeping magic?
He always uses such super powerful magic.
One of the strongest men in Fairy Tail.
He does this because he does not like other people to see his face.
When he comes to take a job, he always puts everyone to sleep like this.
So no one other than the master knows what he looks like.
I know what he looks like.
You were just beat by Erza a second ago!
If you cannot even beat Erza, there is no way you could beat me.
Then get down here and prove it, jerk!
How about you come up here?
Seems you have made him angry.
I am not giving up my seat as the strongest in Fairy Tail for anyone!
Not to Erza or Mystogan, either.
How he cannot go up to the second floor.
It is a bit early to talk to you about it, Lucy.
But the second-floor request board has jobs posted to it so difficult they do not even compare to the ones on the first.
These are jobs where the slightest mistake would mean death.
Of course, the rewards are correspondingly high.
Only wizards who the master approves can take on S class quests.
If you include Erza, Laxus, and Mystogan, then there are only 5 people who can do them.
S class is not really something you should seek out.
They are all jobs where you would need a great number of lives!
I have heard of both Mystosan and Laxus before.
Fairy Tail really is an amazing guild.
And I think I know how everyone ranks in power about now.
I am going to work hard starting tomorrow!
If you are going to weight lift, do it in your own house!
Sure, but I do not care about barbells!
We have got to get more powerful if we are going to beat Erza and Laxus.
It does not matter to me, now leave!
We are going to train all night!
Let us do an S class quest, Lucy!
I thought you could not go up to the second floor?
We went up and took one.
Well, it is our first time, so we picked the cheapest one.
Even so, it is still 7 million jewel!
We do not have permission to do an S class.
If we do this right, then gramps'll have to recognize us.
Really, you are always doing crazy things like this.
At least follow the rules of your own guild.
If I do that, I will never get to go up to the second floor!
It is a job where we are supposed to rescue an island.
Now I am definitely not going!
Even if I offer to give you half the fish?
Go cool your heads a little, sheesh.
Wait, now it looks like I stole it!
What am I going to do?
You also get one of the 12 Gold Gate keys?
One of the requests on the second floor disappeared!
Let us ride on a tin horse, just the two of us.
It is sad that my beloved doll cannot talk to me...
Every time I think of you tears start to flow...
I am a crybaby, are not I?
In the moon (the moon) at night (at night)
I am at a loss for words (Hey!
so much it is like I am under a spell.
from which I will never awaken.
I am at a loss for words (Hey!
since I have completely fallen in love.
I wonder what spell I could chant,
I just love you like crazy!
One day I want to be able to tell you
There is nothing more to say!
It is our first time, so let us do the simplest one.
Then how about this Galuna Island one?
I bet that Lucy would want this extra reward.
Let us decide on this one.
Let us go lift weights at Lucy's house until we go on the job!
Nothing like a work out to get you invigorated!
